description: This file sets up a knowledge base from PDF CVs, initializes an agent and a team, and performs a query related to a specific user. It involves data loading, agent and team configuration, and a sample interaction.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of performing tasks based on knowledge and a language model.

classes.name: PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Manages a collection of PDF documents and their associated metadata, stored in a vector database.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model used for generating responses.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Encapsulates a group of agents and manages collaborative interactions.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Downloads sample PDF files for knowledge base population.
